page.title: 17BUCKENHAM CHURCH
page.content: Buckenham Church is what as known as a redundant Church_as it is now only used once a year.It has been restored and is maintained in good order.The present vicar is one of a team that work on a circuit_working on an regular basis in active churches;in this case,in Brundall area.The church was once regularly attended_serving the dispersed farming community.Its bell,which was of special historical interest has been stolen.One of its former rectors,the Rev. Beauchamp; obviously can be linked to thepublic house across the river,the Beauchamp Arms.Both sides of the river were linked at one stage by ferry.
